text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Bahraini press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Bahrain business forges closer links with Philippines.
- Tunisia looking to boost economic ties with Bahrain.
- Gulf Air plane skids off runway in Abu Dhabi. At least 38 people are still in hospital.
- Challenges facing the petroleum industry in the health, safety and environment areas will be among key issues to be discussed at an oil conference in Bahrain next week.
- Bahrain's Security Court continues trial of 81 suspects accused of plotting to topple the government by force.
- Bahrain sends relief aid to victims of Iran's earthquake.
